0123.name: Unknown
0123.message:
You cannot use online services with this
Game Card.

For help, visit support.nintendo.com.
0123.long_description:
Rom ID is banned.
Originally caused by multiple sessions being online with the same card header on Nintendo Network. Anti-piracy measure involving banning game cards from online play.
0123.short_solution: This error is very unlikely to be used on Pretendo Network.
0123.long_solution: This error is very unlikely to be used on Pretendo Network.
